app_description.message: Strictly block all popup requests from any website

context_item4.message: Open the last popup request in a background tab

context_item5.message: Redirect the current tab to the last popup request

context_item6.message: Move focus from page to the last popup request

options_item1.message: Maximum number of popup requests for a single page

options_item2.message: Timeout for displaying each popup (in seconds)

options_item3.message: Do not block popup requests from same origin

options_item5.message: Display the total number of blocked requests in the toolbar icon

options_item6.message: Do not block popups of these origins:

options_item7.message: Do not block any popup on these pages:

options_item8.message: For this change to take effect, refresh the tab.

options_item9.message: Countdown for performing the last action (in seconds)

options_item10.message: Use zero number to disable the countdown to perform the previous action.

options_item15.message: Prevent page redirection for 2 seconds after a popup is requested

options_item17.message: Default action when a popup is requested

options_item23.message: Ignore popup notification when possible (not recommended)

options_item28.message: Allow page redirection to the following origins:

options_item29.message: Allow page redirection to the same origin

options_item30.message: Simulate the 'allow' button to prevent your browser's internal popup blocker from blocking these requests

options_item32.message: Do not block the popup origin anymore

options_item33.message: Allow the top-level page to show any popups

options_item35.message: Apply the following custom CSS rules to the popup interface:

options_item40.message: Focus the newly generated popup interface. You can then use shortcuts or the Escape key to hide

options_item37.message: When this mode is enabled, the extension installs a mutation observer to monitor static IFrames with 'JavaScript:' src attributes. This enhances the blocking power but has performance drawbacks.

options_item41.message: Action on a new popup request

options_item48.message: Read documentation on how to configure extension's scope.

options_t_1.message: comma-separated list of hostnames (e.g.: www.google.com, www.yahoo.com)

options_t_2.message: comma-separated list of domains (e.g.: google.com, yahoo.com)

options_t_3.message: A JSON object that guides the extension in executing a specific action in response to a popup request, determined by its URL. Read the FAQs page for examples.

options_t_4.message: Enter a comma-separated list of patterns to define the global scope. Only change this if you know what you're doing, as incorrect values may break the extension. Read FAQs page for more info

ui_button_allow.message: Allow this popup (Alt + Shift + A or Control + Option + A)

ui_button_redirect.message: Redirect current page to the new destination instead of opening it in a new tab or popup (Alt + Shift + R or Control + Option + R)

ui_button_background.message: Open the link in a background tab (Alt + Shift + B or Control + Option + B)

ui_button_deny.message: Decline the popup or tab opening (Alt + Shift + D or Control + Option + D)

ui_button_trust.message: White-list this domain to open popups (Alt + Shift + T or Control + Option + T)

bg_msg_state_0.message: Popup Blocker is globally enabled, but not active in this tabâ€”likely because it's an internal page, out of scope page or still loading.

bg_msg_state_1.message: Popup Blocker is globally enabled and protects this tab

bg_msg_state_2.message: Popup Blocker is globally enabled but does not protect this tab

bg_msg_state_3.message: Popup Blocker is globally disabled and does not protect this tab

bg_msg_state_4.message: Popup Blocker is globally disabled but protects this tab

bg_msg_reg.message: Registering blocking filter failed due to an improperly formatted rule. Use the options page to fix it.

pp_health.message: The background script seems to be unresponsive. Do you want to try restarting the extension?
